properties.abstract: The large Tochuhorn with its two summits is a beautiful vantage point above Simplonpass. The ascent is rather short, but the north ridge has a few climbing passages, which give the tour a challenging touch. Thus the traverse of Tochuhorn becomes a multifaceted hiking tour. There are other routes to the mountain which offer no difficulties, making it a rewarding destination for pure pleasure seekers.
properties.subtitle: Short, but challenging tour above Simplonpass
properties.title: Traverse north ridgeâ€“west ridge
